abstract: Jay, I hope you know how much your guide and videos have helped with planning my trip to Paris. The Wallace Fountains in this video are just one small example of little things adding up to a big contribution. I suspect that when I get back your vlog will be even more meaningful, so, thanks so much for this channel.
Since watching your blogs i've been drinking so much more coffee :) anyway great vlog as usuall, this 20/20 concept is really fun!
I did an Airbnb in the 11th. Loved the area, so much good food...but as a Texan I was afraid to try to BBQ, looks like I missed out.
